about_the_game:
Warden's Edition (over $60 of in-game items)
An incredible package that has everything a Warden needs to get started in Moonrise!

  • Moonrise Base Game
  • 4-Star Graveljaw
  • 4-Star Zaptrap
  • 4-Star Khemony
  • 1x Solari Booster (6x Solari each, with a guaranteed 4-star in each booster)
  • 5000 Gold
  • 2000 Gems
  • 1x EXCLUSIVE Snowy Crownlord Solari Skin
detailed_description:
Warden's Edition (over $60 of in-game items)
An incredible package that has everything a Warden needs to get started in Moonrise!

  • Moonrise Base Game
  • 4-Star Graveljaw
  • 4-Star Zaptrap
  • 4-Star Khemony
  • 1x Solari Booster (6x Solari each, with a guaranteed 4-star in each booster)
  • 5000 Gold
  • 2000 Gems
  • 1x EXCLUSIVE Snowy Crownlord Solari Skin

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX Mavericks (version 10.9)
  • Processor: 2.53 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9400M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX Yosemite (version 10.10)
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Moonrise Base Game + Warden's Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.86GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9600 GSO/ Radeon HD 2600 XT / Intel HD 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8.1
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 450 \ Radeon HD 5850 \ Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Warden's Edition — Includes Moonrise base game, an exclusive Solari skin, and a bundle of premium ingame content offered at far less than the regular price.
